<< text Graphics functions view >>

title

Add title.

Syntax

title(text)
title(ax, text)
title(..., propertyName, propertyValue)
go = title(...)

Input argument

text

Text to display: character vector, string scalar, string array or cell array.

ax

a scalar graphics object value: parent container, specified as a axes.

propertyName

a scalar string or row vector character.

propertyValue

a value.

Output argument

go

a graphics object: text type.

Description

title('text') adds the title to the current axes.

Example

f = figure();
x = linspace(-1, 1);
y = sin(2*pi*x);
plot(x, y);
title('Unicode ドラゴンボールZ(ゼット)', 14);

See also

text, xlabel.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
